widget.convert: {"templates": {"default":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 0,1),size=( 35,38),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 45,1),size=(185,38),font=0,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(240,5),size=(120,30),font=0,text=3), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(365,5),size=(350,30),font=0,text=4), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(750,5),size=(30,30),png=5), ],True,"showNever"), "notselected":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 0,1),size=( 35,38),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 45,1),size=(185,38),font=0,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(240,5),size=(120,30),font=0,text=3), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(365,5),size=(350,30),font=0,text=4), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(750,5),size=(30,30),png=5), ],False,"showNever"), "subs":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 0,1),size=( 35,38),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 45,1),size=(185,38),font=0,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(240,5),size=(120,30),font=1,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP,text=3), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(365,5),size=(350,30),font=1,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP,text=4), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(750,5),size=(30,30),png=5), ],True,"showNever"), "subs_notselected":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 0,1),size=( 35,38),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=( 45,1),size=(185,38),font=0,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(240,5),size=(120,30),font=1,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP,text=3), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(365,5),size=(415,30),font=1,flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER|RT_WRAP,text=4), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(750,5),size=(30,30),png=5), ],False,"showNever")}, "fonts":[gFont("Regular",26),gFont("Regular",24)],"itemHeight":40}

{"template":[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (340, 40), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), #device name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (555, 0), size = (200, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), #connection state MultiContentEntryText(pos = (350, 0), size = (200, 40), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), #pairing state MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 40), size = (300, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), #device address MultiContentEntryText(pos = (455, 40), size = (300, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), #rssi ], "itemHeight": 80, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28), gFont("Regular", 26)] }

eLabel.text: F I L E L I S T
P L A Y L I S T

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 6), size = (1710, 72), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is filename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 81), size = (1710, 72), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_WRAP, text = 1), # index 1 is remux filename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 156), size = (1710, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # index 2 is state or error msg MultiContentEntryText(pos = (615, 156), size = (1080, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # index 3 is progress-text ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 27)], "itemHeight": 192 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = ( 16, 6), size = (372, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (418, 6), size = (187, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # codec, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (635, 6), size = (350, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # description, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (990, 0), size = (45, 45), png = 3), # selection ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 32), gFont("Regular", 21)], "itemHeight": 45 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110, textsize[1] + 110) offset=40 if self.type==self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=100 wsizex=textsize[0] + 180 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20, 90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

widget.convert:

MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0,61),size = (1800,1),font=0,flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = ""), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",24),gFont("Regular",30)], "itemHeight": 62 }

{"templates": {"default":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5,0),size=(1000,40),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(500,0),size=(500,40),font=0,flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 1), ]), "channel_bouquet":(40,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,0),size = (370,40),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (380,0),size = (370,40),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (760,0),size = (370,40),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 2), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1140,0),size = (370,40),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 3), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1520,0),size = (360,40),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = 4),
MultiContentEntryText(pos = (375,0),size = (1,40),font=0,flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = "", backcolor=0xa0a0a0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (755,0),size = (1,40),font=0,flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = "", backcolor=0xa0a0a0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1135,0),size = (1,40),font=0,flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = "", backcolor=0xa0a0a0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1515,0),size = (1,40),font=0,flags = RT_VALIGN_CENTER,text = "", backcolor=0xa0a0a0), ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",25),gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 40 }

screen.name: DialogScreen
screen.title: DialogScreen
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,(720-wsizey)/2))

screen.name: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,(720-wsizey)/2))
